snippet.title: Awakening: The Golden Age Collector's Edition
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1E4gqPi
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/1HWgwTS

Play a FREE trial of this immersive, high-quality game! Then pay once & play forever offline! 

Not all is as it appears in the magical world of Awakening, where each human has their own unique ability, including you. Uncover the secrets behind the war, or the kingdom of your birth will be destroyed!

• WHEN MINOTAURS ATTACK, ONLY YOU CAN SAVE THE DAY
The Human Kingdom has been living in peace… until now. With your village razed by minotaurs, you must escape with the help of a mysterious Ranger and find out the truth behind the attack.

• A DARK, NEW STORY SET IN THE AWAKENING WORLD
Before Queen Sophia was born, the Human Kingdom lived in an age of glory: the golden age. However, this age too had its dark times. Beneath a veneer of peace, war has come with minotaurs invading human villages.

• CAN YOU STOP THE WAR?
Meet characters that explore lushly detailed and unique landscapes with you, helping you with their unique abilities! Solve hidden object scenes, and use your magical ability to solve puzzles and uncover clues!

• DISCOVER THE SECRETS THAT LIE IN THE HUMAN KINGDOM
Enjoy exclusive extras such as wallpapers, replayable mini-games, cutscenes, concept art, and more!

*This game is best experienced on iPhone 4s/iPod Touch 5th gen and up.* 

*** Discover more from Big Fish! ***

Check out our entire game library with our Big Fish Games app absolutely FREE here: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishGamesApp

Sign up for our newsletter and never miss a new release or promotion again: http://bigfi.sh/iSplashNewsletter

Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere — on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com!
